entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or drizzle changing to rain after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
